title: Artificial Intelligence Amendments
general_provisions: This bill enacts the AI Companion Chatbot Safety Act to regulate AI companion chatbots and protect consumers.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms; <hr><ltbullet>requires suppliers of AI companion chatbots to implement safety protocols to identify and mitigate safety-critical situations;<hr><ltbullet>requires suppliers to assess safety protocol efficacy and generate user engagement estimates; <hr><ltbullet>requires suppliers to facilitate independent evaluation of safety protocols; <hr><ltbullet>requires suppliers to publicly report on safety protocols, efficacy assessments, and user engagement estimates; <hr><ltbullet>grants the Office of Artificial Intelligence Policy authority to establish disclosure standards and monitor compliance; <hr><ltbullet>establishes a sunset date for certain safety protocol, monitoring, and reporting requirements; <hr><ltbullet>prohibits suppliers from introducing or permitting minors to access material harmful to minors; <hr><ltbullet>restricts suppliers from sending unsolicited communications to encourage user engagement; <hr><ltbullet>prohibits suppliers from selling or sharing highly sensitive information with third parties; <hr><ltbullet>prohibits suppliers from selling or sharing personal data of minors with third parties; <hr><ltbullet>restricts suppliers from introducing commercial content into conversations with minors; <hr><ltbullet>requires suppliers to provide deletion options and public disclosures about risks and data practices; <hr><ltbullet>requires suppliers to disclose that AI companion chatbots are artificial intelligence and not human; <hr><ltbullet>provides a safe harbor for chatbots not designed to facilitate emotional engagement; <hr><ltbullet>grants the Division of Consumer Protection enforcement authority; <hr><ltbullet>provides for administrative fines and civil penalties; and<hr><ltbullet>provides a severability clause.
